description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Oita, Japan. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Japan Spa-Inspired Luxury in Acclaimed Beppu Onsens Region
hotels.description: Take a much-needed breather at the tranquil ANA InterContinental Beppu Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel, situated in Japan's invigorating hot spring area. An eclectic combination of onsen heritage, chic décor and world-class dining options, this hotel provides the perfect base from which to explore Beppu's rich culture. After a stroll through the neighbourhood and visit to the acclaimed hot springs, relax with exceptional spa treatments and an indulgent dinner in the hotel's seasons-inspired restaurant.

hotels.title: Contemporary Oita Retreat near Beppu Hells with Onsite Onsen Hot Springs
hotels.description: Stay near the famous Beppu Hells at this elegant retreat in one of Japan's most legendary onsen towns. Overlooking the azure waters of Beppu Bay, this chic hotel invites you to indulge in authentic Japanese cuisine at Le Sensoriel or relax in the hotel's tranquil hot springs. This hotel is the perfect base for exploring Oita Prefecture's natural and cultural wonders, including the historic Usuki Stone Buddhas, Oita Marine Palace Museum and Sanrio's all-ages amusement park, Harmonyland.
